${ModID}:Vindicate.NAME: Vindicate
${ModID}:Vindicate.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:DarkLance.NAME: Dark Lance
${ModID}:DarkLance.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If you've changed Stances this turn, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:Slam.NAME: Slam
${ModID}:Slam.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:Decapitate.NAME: Decapitate
${ModID}:Decapitate.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:TitansStrength.NAME: Titan's Strength
${ModID}:TitansStrength.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Epiphany.NAME: Epiphany
${ModID}:Epiphany.DESCRIPTION: If you are in a Stance, exit it and draw !M! cards. NL Otherwise, enter ${ModID}:Aggression.

${ModID}:InnerFury.NAME: Inner Fury
${ModID}:InnerFury.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter or exit ${ModID}:Aggression, gain !M! temporary Strength and !M! Block. NL Enter ${ModID}:Aggression.

${ModID}:LunaticRage.NAME: Lunatic Rage
${ModID}:LunaticRage.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Discard all non-Attack non-Status cards. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Animosity.NAME: Animosity
${ModID}:Animosity.DESCRIPTION: When you enter, exit, or start your turn in ${ModID}:Aggression, gain !M! Strength.
